title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, November 2, 2019
description: Today we feature a poem by Raphael Kosek, “The Way West,” and mark the birthday of Marie Antoinette (1755).
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today we feature a poem by Raphael Kosek, “The Way West,” and mark the birthday of Marie Antoinette (1755).
